alert.note: Alert for Culebra; Vieques (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 21 at 11:52AM ADT until September 21 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices of 108-111 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...Urban and coastal areas in Culebra and Vieques. * WHEN...Until 5 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is likely with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
